news.title: ICYMI: American Bar Association Formal Ethics Opinion on Responding to Online Criticism
news.description: Many legal professionals struggle with responding appropriately to negative comments or poor online reviews. The ABA recently released a formal ethics opinion addressing the implications of such a response.

news.title: Google Ads Will Update Keyword Phrase Matching to Include Broad Match Modifier Behavior
news.description: Google Ads announced that they are modifying Phrase Match to include Broad Match Modifier behavior. They will be eliminating Broad Match Modifier altogether by the end of July.

news.title: SOFA SUMMIT 2021 by Smartly.io Recap: The Art of Social Media – How to Boost Your Creativity
news.description: The Justia Team recaps some strategies shared by Peg Fitzpatrick, an accomplished author and social media strategist, to boost your creativity when tackling your online marketing strategy.

news.title: Google My Business Messaging Now Available in Desktop Interface
news.description: Businesses’ owners can now reply to messages from customers through their web browser by using the Google My Business desktop interface.
